name: Commodity Channel Index Signals
question: Which stocks are showing CCI overbought or oversold reversal signals?
retailQuestion: Which stocks are extremely overbought or oversold?
description: Analyzes Commodity Channel Index (CCI) to identify overbought conditions above +100 and oversold conditions below -100. Examines CCI divergences, zero-line crosses, and extreme readings to predict potential reversal points and trend changes.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get active stocks for CCI signal screening
Step 2: Get historical price data for CCI calculation and signal analysis
Step 3: Check portfolio positions for CCI reversal opportunities
Step 4: Calculate Commodity Channel Index and identify overbought/oversold reversal signals
Step 5: Rank CCI signals by extremity and reversal probability

followUp: Should I sell overbought stocks immediately?
Are oversold stocks good buying opportunities?
How long do these extreme conditions last?
